review: Excellent product that works exactly as advertised.  Just wish there was more free movies and unless you are an Amazon Prime Member, the cost of the films is even higher.  Still very much worth the cost for what it does.  I would recommend this and have to several of my friends
author: Larry C. Bowles "fersken"

review: Very easy to install. Works well. Very sharp picture.
author: MJ

review: Keep to chromecast. Device keeps randomly disconnecting from WIFI and WIFI is not the problem. Completely unusable. Amazon doesn't seem to have a SW update planned.
author: Carlos M Velez

review: I absolutely love this. I can watch all of my Netflix movies on my television now. The only thing I don't like is people can view my private photos from my kindle :( not sure if there is a way to hide them. Other than that this is perfect.

review: The best thing I have ever used. It was so easy to download apps to the stick for what I use
